title: One Piece Episode 340 Recap
author: Adult Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap of Episode 340, describing it as 'another fun episode of One Piece and a pretty interesting one' with character introductions. The review discusses the carriage ride through the forest, the zombie attack, Cindry's plate-throwing introduction, and Hogback's debut. Rated 4 out of 5 'plate-hating blondes'.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains mild spoilers for the next few episodes of Thriller Bark arc

title: 340-341: The Man Called a Genius! Hogback Makes His Appearance! and Nami's in a Major Pinch! The Zombie Mansion and the Invisible Man!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's perspective on episodes 340-341, analyzing the introduction of Hogback and Cindry, the zombie mansion dynamics, and the Straw Hats' reactions to the bizarre situation.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewer commentary limited to episodes 340-341 only

title: One Piece with A Lime - Episodes 340-342
author: One Piece with A Lime
description: Podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 340-342, discussing the introduction of Dr. Hogback, Cindry, and the early Thriller Bark mansion storyline.

title: ONE PIECE EP 340 'The Man Called a Genius! Hogback Appears!' Full Length Reaction
author: mikeyventure
description: Full-length unedited reaction video to One Piece episode 340 featuring Hogback's introduction and the Thriller Bark mansion storyline.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Reaction video limited to episode 340 content only

title: Episode 340 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 340 containing full plot summary, character debuts, production credits, trivia, and references to manga chapters.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Wiki contains information from all One Piece arcs including major spoilers

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - Thriller Bark Coverage
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: A One Piece review podcast that covers the Thriller Bark arc including episode 340's introduction of Hogback and the mansion storyline.
